metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1633 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A credentials leak flaw was found in OpenStack Barbican. This flaw allows a local authenticated attacker to read the configuration file, gaining access to sensitive credentials.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> probably Red Hat specific issue, fix appears to be in spec file

criterions.comment: barbican: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
